item.title: Spaghetti Western Actors Network Graph DBpedia
item.description: This is an undirected graph of co-occurrences of actors who appeared in one or more Spaghetti Western films based on data from DBpedia retrieved on August 4, 2015.

item.title: Which Actors Appeared together in Spaghetti Western Films
item.description: This is an undirected graph of co-occurrences of actors who appeared in one or more Spaghetti Western films based on data from DBpedia retrieved on August 4, 2015.

item.title: Data Visualization Posters
item.description: These data visualization posters are available for purchase from Zazzle. You can choose between different sizes, print canvas and optionally add a frame to your visualization print.

item.title: Programming Languages Influence Network 2014
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections of programming languages based on their influences with language and language paradigm highlighting rendered with sigma.js and preprocessed with Gephi.

item.title: Falcao and Iniesta the top players in 2013 according to Ronaldo and Messi
item.description: The Ballon d'Or 2013 visualization shows an interactive network graph of voters and voted football players related based on votes cast for the male FIFA Ballon d'Or award in 2013.

item.title: Ballon d'Or 2013 Male Players Votes Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections between voters and voted male football players from the male FIFA Ballon d'Or vote 2013.

item.title: Where in the World Happen Most Murders
item.description: A series of maps of the world showing where in the world the least and the most murders happen for the years 1995 to 2011.

item.title: World Map of Intentional Homicides
item.description: A series of geographic Choropleth maps showing the number of intentional homicides by country per 100,000 people. Created using World Bank data and D3.js.

item.title: Rail Suicides in Europe: Absolute vs. Relative
item.description: A look at rail suicides data for Europe from 2008 to 2011 highlighting the importance of relating numbers.

item.title: How npm Packages are Linked by Dependencies
item.description: 2 Interactive graph visualizations that show how npm packages are linked by dependency relations, the smaller one is limited to packages with at least 10 dependent packages. Graphs were pre-processed with Gephi and are rendered with sigma.js.
